name: Wandering Troubadour
oracle_text: At the begining of your end step, if you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: "There's a new ballad waiting to be born around every corner."

name: Veteran Dungeoneer
oracle_text: When Veteran Dungeoneer enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
flavor_text: Her tales of glory light a fire in the souls of the next generation of adventurers.

name: Delver's Torch
oracle_text:

oracle_text:
